content:
Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 10500.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 6406.78 billion KZT (61.0% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 8135.91 billion KZT (77.5% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 148.15 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 11.76%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 1.41%
- Net Interest Margin: 5.00%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 20.45% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 16.70%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 3.07%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 117.2%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 42.2%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 152.2%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 122.5%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 78.7%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 551 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 3306 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 3584
- Employee Count: 9,918 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 2,942,161 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 1,765,296 (60.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 65,485
- Corporate Clients: 147,108
- Retail Clients: 2,795,052

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 1927628
- Active Mobile Users: 1,296,477
- Online Transactions Volume: 10.6 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 83.3% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.8/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 5,282,931 total cards
- Credit Cards: 1,379,025
- Debit Cards: 2,904,182
- Active Loan Accounts: 469,075
- Deposit Accounts: 1,804,334

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 388 per day
- Average Service Time: 5.1 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 50
- Employee Productivity Index: 86.7%

Halyk Bank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 23.57%
- Market Share by Loans: 22.97%
- Market Share by Deposits: 22.94%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #1

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 16.6%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 14.4%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 12.6%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 6.0%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 8.1%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Largest branch network nationwide with comprehensive coverage
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Trusted brand with 25+ years of market presence

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 73.30 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 3381.79 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 5442.11 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 44.20 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 2696.59 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 2916.36 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 14.98 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 447.62 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 305,411

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Network optimization and digital transformation
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- Customer experience improvement across all channels
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
Halyk Bank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
